title: My pixel phone is stuck on the boot screen. I have tried bootloader and recovery mode. No luck
content:
My phone is stuck on the boot screen since an hour. Initially while i was watching a video it froze and became unresponsive. I did force shutdown using the power off button but now its stuck on the google logo loop.
I have tried several times pressing the power button and the boot options too - Bootloader / recovery mode - everything gives me the same result. My phone just wont start!
Please help.

Thanks,
Prem
